review: I got this for my mom & sister at home and they absolutely love it.  My mom has now officially been introduced to the world of tv/movie streaming and can't get enough!  Perfect option for those without a smart tv or other device to use & super cheap considering what you get.
author: Crystal

review: Incredibly easy to use. A great tool for streaming. Highly recommend!
author: elisabeth kannenberg

review: I love this product! It was so easy to install and there was a cute tutorial video (don't worry - it was quick) that was extremely helpful. Overall installation took maybe 5 minutes, including downloading Netflix, Plex, & HBOGO. I recommend this for everyone!
author: Honeybee

review: Easy to use , fast, fun, have you watching you favorite show in minutes, we love it !
author: Gilda McCullough

review: We are happy with how easy it is to use. And the great selection of movies and shows.
author: Nan "Nan"

review: this thing freezes several times in a day having me to have to turn it off and reset it several times in a day.  very inconvenient.  device heats up and there's no way to turn it off by remote.  i have to unplug it from the wall and back of tv.  very unhappy with the performance of the product.

review: I am more than happy I purchased the Fire TV Stick! I have been comparing other products and Amazon has been the best choice for me!!
